title: Dow tumbles over 600 points as omicron fears ignite fresh selling to start Christmas week trade
text:
‘My wife is really cheap, which I adore': We have $3M in investments, but I paid the bills while she worked as a teacher. How should we split our expenses in retirement?

'My wife continues to play an aggressive 80% stock strategy.' See full story.

Cathie Wood says stocks have corrected into ‘deep value territory' and won't let benchmarks ‘hold our strategies hostage'

ARK Invest founder Cathie Wood offers the latest defense of once-highflying, disruptive innovation strategies that had made her the toast of Wall Street in 2020. See full story.

Goldman cuts U.S. growth forecast after Sen. Joe Manchin rejects Biden's $2 trillion spending plan

Goldman Sachs says President Joe Biden's signature $2 trillion spending plan had already looked like a close call. See full story.

Data suggests boosters essential to avoid omicron infection, and Fauci says best way to protect kids is make sure adults around them are fully vaccinated

Early data suggests that only the COVID-19 vaccines developed by Pfizer and German partner BioNTech and Moderna, bolstered by a booster shot, are effective against infection with the new omicron variant, with other vaccines such as AstraZeneca's and Johnson & Johnson's failing to offer enough protection. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

'I'm worried and I know people are tired of this. I'm tired of this, but the virus is not tired of us,' he said. See full story.
